resources.string: He is hansmukh(facetious) of our group.Always laugh without reason. Only because of you I passed Digital Electronics.
One needs to learn from you to crack the joke without laughing. Hehehe actually you crack bad jokes.
Never seen a patriotic guy like you. His social media account is full of such things. You always talk about India and its development.Hats off to you man!!
My beer in partner. Together we made uncountable Nightouts.
Aalsi baccha (lazy boy). Really bro. How can anyone be lazy like this?? Leave that habbit bro.
